abstract: On Thursday, the Federal Reserve Board of New York announced that Citigroup had won an auction for $1.6 billion of assets, beating out six other financial firms for the bonds.
snippet: On Thursday, the Federal Reserve Board of New York announced that Citigroup had won an auction for $1.6 billion of assets, beating out six other financial firms for the bonds.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street continues to pick up the pieces from the American International Group blowup.

headline.main: Citigroup Wins Fed Auction for Maiden Lane Bonds
